content: this legal case with reference number 542015 involves parties who are dividing an inheritance the case started on april 11 2014 and ended on march 11 2015 lasting almost a year the parties involved are referred to as pc 34 pcf 33 and p 33 they have registered with the mediation bodies ministry of justice and have agreed to settle the dispute amicably waiving their right to pursue legal measures they have also agreed to redistribute the shares of a company called immobil sud and cover corporate liabilities in proportion to their shares the social assets will be allocated according to a specific scheme and the expenses and fees will be shared equally one party has paid a mediation fee of 40260 which is deducted from the advances already paid the text concludes by mentioning that one party will reimburse the expenses incurred during the process
